hero.title: Mubarek Seid Juhar
hero.subtitle: Lead Software Developer | Full Stack Engineer | Problem Solver
hero.description: Experienced Software Engineer adept in JavaScript, PHP, and Python with a strong understanding of systems, testing, algorithms, and coding. Passionate about creating innovative solutions and delivering high-quality software products.

certSE.detail1: Gained in-depth knowledge of web development fundamentals, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, Flask, and React.
certSE.detail2: Developed a strong understanding of back-end development with Node.js and Express.
certSE.detail3: Completed several projects, including a full-stack web application and a RESTful API.

bsc.detail1: Gained a strong foundation in software engineering principles and practices.
bsc.detail2: Developed proficiency in a variety of programming languages, including Java, Python, and C++.
bsc.detail3: Learned how to design, develop, and test software applications.

jobs.responsibility1: Spearheaded the development of web applications using Python, Flask, Frappe, and ERPNext
jobs.responsibility2: Utilized Jinja templates for front-end development, ensuring seamless user interfaces
jobs.responsibility3: Implemented best practices in software development to ensure efficiency and maintainability
jobs.responsibility4: Collaborated with stakeholders to design and deploy scalable solutions
jobs.responsibility5: Led a team of software engineers in project development and implementation

jobs.responsibility1: Developed and maintained web applications using PHP, CodeIgniter, React.js and Express.js
jobs.responsibility2: Worked on a team of engineers to design and implement new features
jobs.responsibility3: Successfully delivered several projects on time and within budget
jobs.responsibility4: Led a team of software engineers in the development and maintenance of web applications
jobs.responsibility5: Improved efficiency by 30% through optimized coding
